verses.verse: Peter, <WG4074> an apostle <WG652> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> to the strangers <WG3927> scattered throughout <WG1290> Pontus, <WG4195> Galatia, <WG1053> Cappadocia, <WG2587> Asia, <WG773> and <WG2532> Bithynia, <WG978>

Elect according to <WG2596> the foreknowledge <WG4268> of God <WG2316> the Father <WG3962>, through <WG1722> sanctification <WG38> of the Spirit <WG4151>, unto <WG1519> obedience <WG5218> and <WG2532> sprinkling <WG4473> of the blood <WG129> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>: Grace <WG5485> unto you <WG5213>, and <WG2532> peace <WG1515>, be multiplied <WG4129>.

Blessed <WG2128> be the God <WG2316> and <WG2532> Father <WG3962> of <WG2962> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, who <WG3588> according to <WG2596> his <WG846> abundant <WG4183> mercy <WG1656> has fathered <WG313> us <WG2248> again <WG313> unto <WG1519> a living <WG2198> hope <WG1680> by <WG1223> the resurrection <WG386> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>,

To <WG1519> an inheritance <WG2817> incorruptible <WG862>, and <WG2532> undefiled <WG283>, and <WG2532> that fades not away <WG263>, reserved <WG5083> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> for <WG1519> you <WG5209>,

Who <WG3588> are kept <WG5432> by <WG1722> the power <WG1411> of God <WG2316> through <WG1223> faith <WG4102> unto <WG1519> salvation <WG4991> ready <WG2092> to be revealed <WG601> in <WG1722> the last <WG2078> time <WG2540>.
Where <WG1722> you greatly rejoice <WG21>, though now <WG737> for a season <WG3641>, if <WG1487> need be <WG1163>, you are <WG2076> grieved <WG3076> by <WG1722> various <WG4164> trials <WG3986>:

That <WG2443> the trial <WG1383> of your <WG5216> faith <WG4102>, being much <WG4183> more precious than <WG5093> of gold <WG5553> that <WG3588> perishes <WG622>, though <WG1161> it be tried <WG1381> with <WG1223> fire <WG4442>, might be found <WG2147> unto <WG1519> praise <WG1868> and <WG2532> honor <WG5092> and <WG2532> glory <WG1391> at <WG1722> the appearing <WG602> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>:

Whom <WG3739> having <WG1492> not <WG3756> seen <WG1492>, you love <WG25>; in <WG1519> whom <WG3739>, though now <WG737> you see <WG3708> him not <WG3361>, yet <WG1161> believing <WG4100>, you rejoice <WG21> with joy <WG5479> unspeakable <WG412> and <WG2532> full of glory <WG1392>:
Receiving <WG2865> the end <WG5056> of your <WG5216> faith <WG4102>, even the salvation <WG4991> of <WG5590> your souls <WG5590>.

Of <WG4012> which <WG3739> salvation <WG4991> the prophets <WG4396> have inquired <WG1567> and <WG2532> searched diligently <WG1830>, who prophesied <WG4395> of <WG4012> the grace <WG5485> that should come unto <WG1519> you <WG5209>:

Searching <WG2045> <WG99999> what <WG5101>, or <WG2228> what manner of <WG4169> time <WG2540> the Spirit <WG4151> of Christ <WG5547> which <WG3588> was in <WG1722> them <WG846> did signify <WG1213>, when it testified <WG4303> beforehand the sufferings <WG3804> of <WG1519> Christ <WG5547>, and <WG2532> the glory <WG1391> that <WG5023> should follow <WG3326>.

Unto whom <WG3739> it was revealed <WG601>, that <WG3754> not <WG3756> unto themselves <WG1438>, but <WG1161> unto us <WG2254> they did minister <WG1247> the things <WG846>, which <WG3739> are <WG312> now <WG3568> reported <WG312> unto you <WG5213> by <WG1223> them <WG3588> that have preached the gospel <WG2097> unto you <WG5209> with <WG1722> the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> sent down <WG649> from <WG575> heaven <WG3772>; which things <WG3739> the angels <WG32> desire <WG1937> to look <WG3879> into <WG1519>.

Therefore <WG1352> prepare <WG328> <WG99999> your <WG5216> mind <WG1271>, be sober <WG3525>, and hope <WG1679> to the end <WG5049> for <WG1909> the grace <WG5485> that is to be brought <WG5342> unto you <WG5213> at <WG1722> the revelation <WG602> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>;
As <WG5613> obedient <WG5218> sons <WG5043>, not <WG3361> fashioning yourselves according to <WG4964> the former <WG4386> lusts <WG1939> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> ignorance <WG52>:
But <WG235> as <WG2596> he who has called <WG2564> you <WG5209> is holy <WG40>, so <WG2532> be <WG1096> <WG99999> holy <WG40> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> manner of living <WG391>;
Because <WG1360> it is written <WG1125>, Be <WG1096> holy <WG40>; for <WG3754> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> holy <WG40>.

And <WG2532> if <WG1487> you call on <WG1941> the Father <WG3962>, who <WG3588> without respect of persons <WG678> judges <WG2919> according to <WG2596> every man <WG1538>'s work <WG2041>, pass <WG390> the time <WG5550> of your <WG5216> staying <WG3940> here as strangers in <WG1722> fear <WG5401>:

Forasmuch as you know <WG1492> that <WG3754> you were <WG3084> not <WG3756> redeemed <WG3084> with corruptible things <WG5349>, as silver <WG694> and <WG2228> gold <WG5553>, from <WG1537> your <WG5216> vain <WG3152> way <WG391> of life received by tradition from your fathers <WG3970>;
But <WG235> with the precious <WG5093> blood <WG129> of Christ <WG5547>, as <WG5613> of a lamb <WG286> without blemish <WG299> and <WG2532> without spot <WG784>:

Who truly <WG3303> was foreordained <WG4267> before <WG4253> the foundation <WG2602> of the world <WG2889>, but <WG1161> was revealed <WG5319> in <WG1909> these last <WG2078> times <WG5550> for <WG1223> you <WG5209>,

Who <WG3588> by <WG1223> him <WG846> do believe <WG4100> in <WG1519> God <WG2316>, that <WG3588> raised <WG1453> him <WG846> up <WG1453> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>, and <WG2532> gave <WG1325> him <WG846> glory <WG1391>; that <WG5620> your <WG5216> faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> hope <WG1680> might be <WG1511> in <WG1519> God <WG2316>.

Seeing you have purified <WG48> your <WG5216> souls <WG5590> in <WG1722> obeying <WG5218> the truth <WG225> through <WG1223> the Spirit <WG4151> unto <WG1519> unfeigned <WG505> love of the brothers <WG5360>, see that you love <WG25> one another <WG240> with <WG1537> a pure <WG2513> heart <WG2588> fervently <WG1619>:

Being born again <WG313>, not <WG3756> of <WG1537> corruptible <WG5349> seed <WG4701>, but <WG235> of incorruptible <WG862>, by <WG1223> the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316>, which lives <WG2198> and <WG2532> stays <WG3306> for <WG1519> ever <WG165>.

For <WG1360> all <WG3956> flesh <WG4561> is as <WG5613> grass <WG5528>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the glory <WG1391> of man <WG444> as <WG5613> the flower <WG438> of grass <WG5528>. The grass <WG5528> withers <WG3583>, and <WG2532> the flower <WG438> there <WG846> falls away <WG1601>:

But <WG1161> the word <WG4487> of the Lord <WG2962> endures <WG3306> for <WG1519> ever <WG165>. And <WG1161> this <WG5124> is <WG2076> the word <WG4487> which <WG3588> by the gospel is preached <WG2097> unto <WG1519> you <WG5209>.
